We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private SuperTrend _str;
// In Initialize()
_str = STR(symbol, period, multiplier);

// In OnData()
if (_str.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "STR Is Ready", _str.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STR Warm Up Period", _str.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STR Current", _str.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STR Name", _str.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STR Samples", _str.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.str = self.STR(symbol, period, multiplier)

# In OnData()
if self.str.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STR Is Ready", self.str.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STR Warm Up Period", self.str.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STR Current", self.str.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STR Name", self.str.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STR Samples", self.str.Samples);
